control.name: Helm
entries: Flytta upp till hastigheten för dess elementarmotor med en 90-graders sväng. Om ratten förstörs kan luftskeppet inte svänga.
elementär kraft, hastighet 80 ft. Om motorn förstörs kraschar fartyget omedelbart.

weapon.name: Ballistas
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} för att träffa, räckvidd 120/480 fot, ett mål. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) genomträngande skada.

other.name: Actions
entries: Vid sin tur kan luftskeppet använda sin styrning för att förflytta sig med hjälp av sin elementarmotor. Det kan också avfyra sina ballister. Om det har halva sin besättning eller färre kan det avfyra endast två av ballistorna.

vehicle.name: Apparatus of Kwalish

speed.note: (or 0 ft. for both if the legs and tail aren't extended)

entries: Detta föremål ser först ut att vara en stor förseglad järntunna som väger 500 pund. Tunnan har en dold spärr, som kan hittas med en lyckad DC 20 intelligenskontroll ({@skill Investigation}). När man släpper fångsten öppnas en lucka i ena änden av tunnan, vilket gör att två Medium eller mindre varelser kan krypa in i den. Tio spakar är placerade i en rad vid den bortre änden, var och en i ett neutralt läge, som kan flyttas antingen uppåt eller nedåt. När vissa spakar används förvandlas apparaten så att den liknar en jättehummer.

För att kunna användas som fordon krävs en pilot. När apparatens lucka är stängd är utrymmet luft- och vattentätt. Avdelningen rymmer tillräckligt med luft för 10 timmars andning, dividerat med antalet andningsvarelser inuti.
Apparaten flyter på vatten. Den kan också gå under vatten till ett djup av 900 fot. Under det tar fordonet {@damage 2d6} slagskada per minut från tryck.

En varelse i avdelningen kan använda en handling för att flytta så många som två av apparatens spakar uppåt eller nedåt. Efter varje användning går en spak tillbaka till sitt neutrala läge. Varje spak, från vänster till höger, fungerar som visas i tabellen Apparatus of Kwalish Levers.

entries.caption: Apparatus of Kwalish Levers:
rows: Benen och svansen sträcker sig ut så att apparaten kan gå och simma.
Benen och svansen dras in, vilket minskar apparatens hastighet till 0 och gör att den inte kan dra nytta av hastighetsbonusar.
Två klor sträcker sig ut från apparatens framsida.
Varje förlängd klo gör följande närstridsattack: {@hit 8} för att träffa, räckvidd 5 fot, ett mål. {@h} 7 ({@damage 2d6}) blåslagningsskada.
Varje förlängd klo gör följande närstridsattack: {@hit 8} för att träffa, räckvidd 5 fot, ett mål. {@h} Målet är {@condition grappled} (fly {@dc 15}).
Ögonliknande armaturer avger starkt ljus i en radie av 30 fot och dämpat ljus i ytterligare 30 fot.
Apparaten sjunker upp till sex meter i vätska.
Apparaten stiger upp till 6 meter i vätska.
Den bakre luckan öppnas och öppnas.
Den bakre luckan stängs och förseglas.

weapon.name: Ballistas
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} för att träffa, räckvidd 120/480 fot, ett mål. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) genomträngande skada.

vehicle.name: Battle Balloon

control.name: Helm
entries: Flytta dig upp till fartygets propellerhastighet med en 90 graders sväng. Om rodret förstörs kan fartyget inte vända.

control.name: Balloon
entries: Om dess ballong förstörs kan en stridsballong inte hålla höjden.
80 fot; 50 fot när du flyger mot vinden; 100 fot när du flyger med vinden.

weapon.name: Green Flame Arbalester
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} för att träffa, räckvidd 200/800 fot (kan inte träffa mål inom 60 fot) ett mål. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) genomträngande skada och 22 ({@damage 4d10}) brandskada. Om attacken missar bestämmer DM var arbalesterbollen träffar. Varje varelse inom 10 fot från den platsen måste göra ett DC 15 Dexterity räddningskast för att undvika bollen när den splittras, och tar 5 ({@damage 1d10}) genomträngande skada och 5 ({@damage 1d10}) brandskada vid ett misslyckat räddningskast.

weapon.name: Harpoon Gun
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} för att träffa, räckvidd 120/480 fot, ett mål. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d10}) stickande skada, och målet är {@condition grappled} (escape DC 16). Tills gripandet upphör halveras målets hastighet och det kan inte röra sig längre bort från stridsballongen. Var och en av stridsballongens harpunkanoner kan gripa tag i ett mål. Medan den har ett eller flera mål {@condition grappled} med sin harpunkanonattack halveras inte stridsballongens hastighet.

action: On its turn the battle balloon can take 3 actions if it has twenty or more crew, 2 actions if it has ten or more crew, or 1 action if it has fewer than ten crew, choosing from the options below. It cannot take any actions if it has no remaining crew.

items.name: Fire Ballista
items.entry: Stridsballongen kan avfyra sina harpunkanoner.

items.name: Fire Green Flame Arbalester
items.entry: Stridsballongen kan avfyra sin gröna låga arbalester.

items.name: Move
items.entry: Stridsballongen kan använda sin styrning för att förflytta sig med hjälp av sin propeller. Om stridsballongen kommer in i en stor eller mindre varelses utrymme skjuts den varelsen automatiskt till kanten av stridsballongens utrymme. Varelsen måste också lyckas med ett DC 15 Dexterity saving throw eller ta 5 ({@damage 1d10}) bludgeoning damage.

items.name: Harpoon Haul
items.entry: Stridsballongen kan dra varje mål {@condition grappled} vid den upp till 30 fot mot stridsballongen.

trait.name: Crushing Wheels
entries: Demon Grinder kan förflytta sig genom utrymmet för alla stora eller mindre varelser. När den gör det måste varelsen lyckas med ett räddningskast med DC 11 för Dexterity eller ta 22 ({@damage 4d10}) slagskador och slås omkull {@condition prone}. Om varelsen redan var {@condition prone} tar den ytterligare 22 ({@damage 4d10}) slagskada. Den här egenskapen kan inte användas mot en viss varelse mer än en gång per tur.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Demon Grinders vapenattacker är magiska.

trait.name: Prone Deficiency
entries: Om Demon Grinder rullar omkull och faller {@condition prone} kan den inte räta upp sig själv och blir {@condition incapacitated} tills den vänds uppåt.

actionStation.name: Helm (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Three-Quarters Cover)
entries: Kör och styr Demon Grinder.

actionStation.name: Chomper (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} för att träffa, räckvidd 1,5 m, ett mål. {@h}25 ({@damage 6d6 + 4}) genomträngande skada. Ett mål som reducerats till 0 träffpunkter av den här skadan mals till bitar och spottas ut genom rör på båda sidor av Demon Grinder. Alla icke-magiska föremål som målet höll eller bar på förstörs också.

actionStation.name: Wrecking Ball (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} för att träffa, når 15 fot, ett mål. {@h}40 ({@damage 8d8 + 4}) blåslagningsskada. Dubbla skadan om målet är ett föremål eller en struktur.

actionStation.name: 2 Harpoon Flingers (Each Station Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} för att träffa, räckvidd 120 fot, ett mål. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) genomträngande skada.

trait.name: Jump
entries: Om Djävulens ritt rör sig minst 30 fot i en rak linje kan den ta sig över en sträcka på upp till 60 fot när den hoppar över en klyfta, ravin eller annan öppning. Varje fot som den klarar av vid hoppet kostar en fot i rörelse.

trait.name: Prone Deficiency
entries: Om Devil's Ride faller {@condition prone} kan den inte rätta till sig själv och blir {@condition incapacitated} tills den dras upp på rätt köl.

trait.name: Stunt
entries: Vid sin tur kan föraren av Devil's Ride använda 10 fot av sin rörelse för att utföra ett gratis stunt, som till exempel en wheelie eller en burnout. Innan stuntet kan utföras måste Devil's Ride förflytta sig minst 10 fot i en rak linje. Om föraren lyckas med en DC 10 Dexterity-kontroll med hjälp av cykelns Dexterity är stuntet lyckat. I annat fall kan föraren inte utföra stuntet och kan inte försöka ett annat stunt förrän i början av nästa vändning. Om testet misslyckas med 5 eller mer faller Djävulens rida och alla varelser som åker på den omedelbart {@condition prone} när motorcykeln slås ut och stannar.

actionStation.name: Helm (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: Kör och styr Devil's Ride.

reaction.name: Juke
entries: Om Djävulens ritt kan röra sig kan föraren använda sin reaktion för att ge Djävulens ritt en fördel på ett räddningskast med Dexterity.

vehicle.name: Galley

control.name: Helm
entries: Flytta upp till hastigheten för en av dess rörelsekomponenter, med en 90-graders sväng. Om rodret förstörs kan galären inte vrida sig.
30 fot (kräver minst 40 besättningsmän)
35 fot; 15 fot när man seglar mot vinden; 50 fot när man seglar med vinden.

weapon.name: Ballistas
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} för att träffa, räckvidd 120/480 fot, ett mål. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) genomträngande skada.

weapon.name: Mangonels
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} för att träffa, räckvidd 200/800 fot (kan inte träffa mål inom 60 fot), ett mål. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d10}) blåslagningsskada.

weapon.name: Naval Ram
entries: Galeasen har fördel på alla räddningskast som rör kraschning när den kraschar in i en varelse eller ett föremål. Eventuell skada som den tar från kraschen appliceras på flottans ram snarare än på fartyget. Dessa fördelar gäller inte om ett annat fartyg kraschar in i galären.

action: On its turn, the galley can take 3 actions, choosing from the options below. It can take only 2 actions if it has fewer than forty crew and only 1 action if it has fewer than twenty. It can't take these actions if it has fewer than three crew.

items.name: Fire Ballistas
items.entry: Galären kan avfyra sina {@object ballista||ballistas} (DMG, kap. 8).

items.name: Fire Mangonels
items.entry: Galären kan avfyra sina {@object mangonel||mangonels} (DMG, kap. 8).

items.name: Move
items.entry: Galären kan använda sin styrning för att röra sig med sina åror eller segel. Som en del av denna förflyttning kan den använda sin sjöram.

control.name: Helm
entries: Flytta upp till hastigheten för en av dess rörelsekomponenter, med en 90-graders sväng. Om rodret förstörs kan galären inte vrida sig.
segel, fart 35 fot; 15 fot när man seglar mot vinden; 50 fot när man seglar med vinden.
åror, hastighet 30 ft.

weapon.name: Ballistas
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} för att träffa, räckvidd 120/480 fot, ett mål. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) genomträngande skada.

weapon.name: Mangonels
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} för att träffa, räckvidd 200/800 fot (kan inte träffa mål inom 60 fot), ett mål. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d10}) blåslagningsskada.

weapon.name: Ram
entries: Galeasen har fördel på alla räddningskast som rör krock när den kraschar mot en varelse eller ett föremål, och all skada som den lider av krocken appliceras istället på rammen. Dessa fördelar gäller inte om ett fordon kraschar in i galären.

other.name: Actions
entries: On its turn, the galley can move using its helm. It can also fire its ballistas and its mangonels. If it has half its crew or fewer, it moves at half speed and can fire only half of its weapons.

vehicle.name: Keelboat

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the keelboat can't turn.
20 ft.
25 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 35 ft. while sailing with the wind.

weapon.name: Ballista
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} för att träffa, räckvidd 120/480 fot, ett mål. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) genomträngande skada.
Keelboats typically include a ballista only when they are equipped for combat.

action: On its turn, the keelboat can take 2 actions, choosing from the options below. It can take only 1 action if it has only one crew. It can't take these actions if it has no crew.

items.name: Fire Ballista
items.entry: The keelboat can fire its {@object ballista} (DMG, ch. 8).

items.name: Move
items.entry: The keelboat can use its helm to move with its oars or sails.

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the keelboat can't turn.
sails, speed 25 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 35 ft. while sailing with the wind.
oars, speed 20 ft.

weapon.name: Ballista
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) piercing damage. Keelboats typically include a ballista only when they are equipped for combat.

other.name: Actions
entries: On its turn, the keelboat can move using its helm. It can also fire its ballista if it is equipped with one. If it has half its crew or fewer, it moves at half speed and can't use its ballista.

vehicle.name: Longship

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the longship can't turn.
20 ft. (requires at least 20 crew)
45 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 60 ft. while sailing with the wind.

action: On its turn, the longship can take the move action below. It can't take this action if it has no crew.

items.name: Move
items.entry: The longship can use its helm to move with its oars or sails.

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the longship can't turn.
sails, speed 45 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 60 ft. while sailing with the wind.
oars, speed 20 ft.

other.name: Actions
entries: On its turn, the longship can move using its helm. If the longship loses half or more of its crew, it moves at half speed.

vehicle.name: Mechanical Beholder

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of the ship's magical propulsion unit, with one 90-degree turn. The helm can be attacked only if the hull has taken 100 or more damage. If the helm is destroyed, the mechanical beholder can't move.
burrow 30 ft., fly 30 ft. (hover), swim 30 ft.

weapon.name: Eye Ray Tentacles
entries: {@atk g} The mechanical beholder shoots the following magical eye rays at up to three targets that would be visible to the crew and are within 120 feet of it.

items.name: Disintegration Ray
items.entry: If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) force damage. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 hit points, its body becomes a pile of fine gray dust. If the target is a Large or smaller nonmagical object or creation of magical force, it is disintegrated without a saving throw. If the target is a Huge or larger object or creation of magical force, this ray disintegrates a 10-foot cube of it.

items.name: Enervation Ray
items.entry: The targeted creature must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: Paralyzing Ray
items.entry: The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action: On its turn the mechanical beholder can take 1 action. It cannot take any actions if it has no crew.

items.name: Eye Rays
items.entry: The mechanical beholder can use its eye ray tentacles.

items.name: Move
items.entry: The mechanical beholder can use its helm to move using its magical propulsion unit.

weapon.name: Ballistas
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} för att träffa, räckvidd 120/480 fot, ett mål. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) genomträngande skada.

weapon.name: Catapult
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 200/800 ft. (can't hit targets within 60 feet of it), one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d10}) bludgeoning damage.

vehicle.name: Rowboat

entries: 15 ft.
Move up to its speed, with one 90-degree turn. Without oars, the rowboat's speed is 0.

action: On its turn, the rowboat can take the move action below. It can't take this action if it has no crew.

items.name: Move
items.entry: The rowboat can move using its oars.

entries: oars, speed 15 ft. Move up to its speed, with one 90-degree turn. Without oars, the rowboat's speed is 0.

other.name: Actions
entries: On its turn, the rowboat can move using its oars.

vehicle.name: Sailing Ship

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of its sails, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.
45 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 60 ft. while sailing with the wind.

weapon.name: Ballista
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} för att träffa, räckvidd 120/480 fot, ett mål. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) genomträngande skada.

weapon.name: Mangonel
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} för att träffa, räckvidd 200/800 fot (kan inte träffa mål inom 60 fot), ett mål. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d10}) blåslagningsskada.

action: On its turn, the ship can take 3 actions, choosing from the options below. It can take only 2 actions if it has fewer than twenty crew and only 1 action if it has fewer than ten. It can't take these actions if it has fewer than three crew.

items.name: Fire Ballista
items.entry: The ship can fire its {@object ballista} (DMG, ch. 8).

items.name: Fire Mangonel
items.entry: The ship can fire its {@object mangonel} (DMG, ch. 8).

items.name: Move
items.entry: The ship can use its helm to move with its sails.

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of its sails, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.
sails, speed 45 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 60 ft. while sailing with the wind.

weapon.name: Ballista
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} för att träffa, räckvidd 120/480 fot, ett mål. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) genomträngande skada.

weapon.name: Mangonel
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} för att träffa, räckvidd 200/800 fot (kan inte träffa mål inom 60 fot), ett mål. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d10}) blåslagningsskada.

other.name: Actions
entries: On its turn, the sailing ship can move using its helm. It can also fire its ballista and its mangonel. If it has half its crew or fewer, it moves at half speed and can fire either its ballista or its mangonel.

trait.name: Crushing Wheels
entries: The Scavenger can move through the space of any Large or smaller creature. When it does, the creature must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. If the creature was already {@condition prone}, it takes an extra 16 ({@damage 3d10}) bludgeoning damage. This trait can't be used against a particular creature more than once each turn.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The Scavenger's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Prone Deficiency
entries: If the Scavenger rolls over and falls {@condition prone}, it can't right itself and is {@condition incapacitated} until flipped upright.

actionStation.name: Helm (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Three-Quarters Cover)
entries: Drive and steer the Scavenger.

actionStation.name: Grappling Claw (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}The target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 12). If the target is a creature, it is {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends.The grappling claw can grapple only one target at a time, and the claw's operator can use a bonus action to make the claw release whatever it's holding.

actionStation.name: 2 Harpoon Flingers (Each Station Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Pilot
entries: The Stahlmaster requires a Medium humanoid to pilot it. While inside the Stahlmaster, the pilot uses the vehicle's speed and action options and can't take reactions or use bonus actions, and the pilot has total cover. If the Stahlmaster drops to 0 hit points, the pilot is ejected from it and lands {@condition prone} in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the vehicle.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Stahlmaster makes two melee attacks, or one melee attack and one ranged attack.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Shoulder-Mounted Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d12}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Crushing Wheels
entries: The Tormentor can move through the space of any Medium or smaller creature. When it does, the creature must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.If the creature was already {@condition prone}, it takes an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) bludgeoning damage.This trait can't be used against a particular creature more than once each turn.

trait.name: Prone Deficiency
entries: If the Tormentor rolls over and falls {@condition prone}, it can't right itself and is {@condition incapacitated} until flipped upright.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The Tormentor's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Raking Scythes
entries: When the Tormentor moves within 5 feet of a creature that isn't {@condition prone} or another vehicle for the first time on a turn, it can rake the creature or vehicle with its protruding blades for 13 ({@damage 2d10 + 2}) slashing damage. A creature moves out of the way and takes no damage if it succeeds on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw.A vehicle moves out of the way and takes no damage if its driver succeeds on the saving throw.

actionStation.name: Helm (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Three-Quarters Cover)
entries: Drive and steer the Tormentor

actionStation.name: Harpoon Flinger (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Juke
entries: If the Tormentor is able to move, the driver can use its reaction to grant the Tormentor advantage on a Dexterity saving throw.

vehicle.name: Warship

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the warship can't turn.
20 ft. (requires at least 20 crew)
35 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 50 ft. while sailing with the wind.

weapon.name: Ballistas
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} för att träffa, räckvidd 120/480 fot, ett mål. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) genomträngande skada.

weapon.name: Mangonels
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} för att träffa, räckvidd 200/800 fot (kan inte träffa mål inom 60 fot), ett mål. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d10}) blåslagningsskada.

weapon.name: Naval Ram
entries: The warship has advantage on all saving throws relating to crashing when it crashes into a creature or object. Any damage it takes from the crash is applied to the naval ram rather than to the ship. These benefits don't apply if another vessel crashes into the warship.

action: On its turn, the warship can take 3 actions, choosing from the options below. It can take only 2 actions if it has fewer than twenty crew and only 1 action if it has fewer than ten. It can't take these actions if it has fewer than three crew.

items.name: Fire Ballistas
items.entry: The warship can fire its {@object ballista||ballistas} (DMG, ch. 8).

items.name: Fire Mangonels
items.entry: The warship can fire its {@object mangonel||mangonels} (DMG, ch. 8).

items.name: Move
items.entry: The warship can use its helm to move with its oars or sails. As part of this move, it can use its naval ram.

control.name: Helm
entries: Move up to the speed of one of its movement components, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the warship can't turn.
segel, fart 35 fot; 15 fot när man seglar mot vinden; 50 fot när man seglar med vinden.
oars, speed 20 ft. with 80 or more rowers, 10 feet with 40 or more rowers, 5 ft. with 20 or more rowers.

weapon.name: Ballistas
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} för att träffa, räckvidd 120/480 fot, ett mål. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) genomträngande skada.

weapon.name: Mangonels
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} för att träffa, räckvidd 200/800 fot (kan inte träffa mål inom 60 fot), ett mål. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d10}) blåslagningsskada.

weapon.name: Ram
entries: The warship has advantage on all saving throws relating to crashing when it crashes into a creature or object. Any damage it suffers from the crash is instead applied to the ram. These benefits do not apply if another vessel crashes into the warship.

other.name: Actions
entries: On its turn, the warship can move using its helm. It can also fire its ballistas and mangonels. If it has half its crew or fewer, it moves at half speed and can fire only half of its weapons.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Acidic Bile Sprayer
entries: This hose weapon is attached to demonic organs that produce an acidic bile that dissolves flesh on contact.

entries.name: Acidic Bile Sprayer (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover, {@recharge 5|m})
entries: Acidic bile sprays from a nozzle in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the cone must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 40 ({@damage 9d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage is dissolved, leaving behind any objects it was carrying or wearing.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Arcane Artillery
entries: Using methods similar to those used to produce magic weapons, a skilled spellcaster imbues a ship's weapon with destructive energy. This weapon gains a +2 bonus to its attack and damage rolls, and its attacks count as magical.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Bones of Endless Toil
entries: The bones of ancient, mysterious creatures festoon the ship. Potent runes crawl across these remains, emitting a sickly green radiance. When a humanoid dies aboard the ship, that creature must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, it dies as normal. If it fails, it immediately rises as a {@creature zombie} obedient to the ship's captain. The zombie gains a working knowledge of the ship, allowing it to serve as a member of the crew. A number of creatures equal to the ship's creature capacity can be animated in this manner at any given time.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Canian Armor
entries: The infernal iron used to make the vehicle was mined on Cania, the coldest layer of the Nine Hells. An infernal war machine with Canian armor has an Armor Class of 22 + its Dexterity modifier. While the vehicle is not moving, attack rolls made against it have advantage. The infernal war machine also has immunity to cold damage in addition to its other damage immunities, and it's immune to the effects of extreme cold.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Churning Hull
entries: A tempest rages within these rune-etched, iron chains. Raiders and pirates who operate under the blessings of a storm god sometimes make use of this upgrade.

By draping the chains over a ship's hull, the storm's fury thrashes into the water around it. The water within 210 feet of the ship is {@quickref difficult terrain||3} for everything other than this ship.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Clockwork Oars
entries: Using a combination of magic and clockwork, the oars on this ship require only one crew member to use them, pushing the button or lever that activates them.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Concussive Rounds
entries: Enhanced by abjuration magic, this weapon's attacks burst with raucous noise capable of momentarily distracting and disorienting enemy crews. If this weapon hits a vehicle's hull, that vehicle's speed decreases by {@dice 2d10} feet until the start of the attacker's next turn.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Death Vessel
entries: Crafted with materials harvested from the Shadowfell, this upgrade grants a ship an aura of dread. As an action, the ship can create a pulse of horrific energy. Every creature that is an enemy of the ship who is on board or within 210 feet of it must make DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature is {@condition frightened} of the ship for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this ability for 24 hours. Once this ability is used, it can't be used again until {@dice 1d4} hours have passed.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Defiant Sails
entries: These sails glitter with a fine coat of mithral treated with abjuration magic. While the sails are unfurled, ranged weapon attacks made against the ship and anyone aboard it are made with disadvantage, as a result of the sails' protective magic. This drawback doesn't apply if the attacker is aboard the ship.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Dragon Sails
entries: Dragon scales woven into these sails make them more resistant to damage. The sails gain a +3 bonus to AC, and they have resistance to a damage type based on the type of scales used to craft them, as shown on the Dragon Sails table.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Ever-Full Sails
entries: These billowing sails are woven from cloud-stuff drawn from the Elemental Plane of Air. Wind whips and whistles around them, allowing a ship to move with a speed of 60 feet regardless of direction relative to the wind.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Explosive Rounds
entries: Drawing on powerful evocation magic, this weapon's attacks are imbued with unstable energy that explodes in a fiery blast. When this weapon hits, it deals an extra {@damage 2d6} fire damage.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Flamethrower
entries: Although useless against demons, this weapon is great against flammable creatures and objects.

entries.name: Flamethrower (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: Fire shoots out of the weapon's nozzle in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being carried or worn.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Frost-Locked Hull
entries: This upgrade replaces a ship's hull with supernatural ice drawn from the elemental planes. The hull and the other components of the ship are immune to cold damage but vulnerable to fire damage. The ship can also move at its normal speed over ice of any thickness, floating on the ice at the same depth as it would in water.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Gilded Death Armor
entries: Gold stolen or bartered from the archdevil Mammon plates the vehicle's exterior. This gold can't be removed without destroying the vehicle and turns to dust when the infernal war machine drops to 0 hit points. Gilded death armor grants the infernal war machine resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Grasping Rounds
entries: This weapon creates spectral chains that trail after its shots, restraining enemy vessels in their grasp. When this weapon hits a ship, that vehicle must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or it can't move away from the attacker. As an action, the attacking ship can end this effect, and the target can end it by taking an action and succeeding on a DC 14 Strength check.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Guardian Figurehead
entries: This figurehead depicts an armored knight. As an action, the ship can activate this item, causing it to animate as an {@creature iron golem}. The golem acts on the ship's turn when the captain uses one of the ship's actions. The golem remains animated for 1 minute. At the end of that time, it teleports back to its position as a figurehead. Once a ship uses this action, it can't use it again for 24 hours.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Infernal Screamer
entries: A writhing humanoid torso made of melting wax juts out from this station, with a barbed hand crank between its shoulder blades. The figure telepathically shrieks in agony when the crank is turned.

entries.name: Infernal Screamer (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover)
entries: The screamer's operator targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of the screamer. The target must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw, taking 26 ({@damage 4d12}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Living Vessel
entries: This vessel's hull was crafted in the Feywild under the direction of master eladrin shipwrights. It is a living plant, drawing sustenance from water and sunlight. Vines covered in thick leaves hang over its side, and the wood runs with fresh sap when damaged. The ship gains a +2 bonus to all Constitution checks or saving throws. As long as the ship has at least 1 hit point, it regains 10 hit points every minute.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Necrotic Smoke Screen
entries: The vehicle's driver can activate this magical device as a bonus action, causing the vehicle to expel a 30-foot cube of opaque smoke directly in front of it or behind it. The cloud is stationary and lasts for 1 minute. The area within it is heavily obscured. Any creature that enters the cloud for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage. A strong wind disperses the cloud. This device needs 24 hours to recharge before it can be used again.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Red Dragon Figurehead
entries: This figurehead depicts a red dragon rearing to strike, its mouth open. As an action, the ship can activate this item to create a 60-foot cone of flame that originates from the figurehead. Each creature and object in the cone must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Once a ship uses this action, it can't use it again for 1 minute.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Reinforced Hull
entries: A master shipwright can use superior materials and clever design to make a ship's hull more resilient. Such reinforcement doubles the hull's hit point maximum.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Screaming Sails
entries: Woven from the energy of captured wraiths and bound with the spirit of a banshee, these sails groan mournfully when they catch the wind. As an action, while within 5 feet of the sails, the ship's captain can cause the sails to unleash a howl. Every creature hostile to the ship who is on board or within 300 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw, or the creature takes {@damage 4d6} psychic damage and is then {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. Once this ability has been used, it can't be used again until {@dice 2d6} hours have passed.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Scything Oars
entries: Sharpened, magically reinforced oars make a vessel dangerous to approach. When the ship takes an action that moves it with these oars, any creature or object in the water within 10 feet of it at any point of the move must make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 2d6} slashing damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Smuggler's Banner
entries: This flag is meant to be flown from a ship's mast. Its powerful magic causes it to appear as a flag or banner displaying the symbol of a group, captain, or realm friendly to the viewer. Multiple viewers might see different flags or crests.

The banner's true power is its ability to aid a ship in making rapid escapes. As an action, the ship and all friendly creatures aboard it teleport up to 3 miles to a known destination of the captain's choice. Hostile creatures aboard the ship don't move with the ship and fall into the water it once occupied. Once this item is used to teleport, it can't teleport in this way again for {@dice 2d6} days.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Soul Spike Armor
entries: The vehicle is covered with spikes inscribed with blasphemous symbols. Luminous, ghostly figures impaled on these spikes wail and reach out in agony.

If a creature that isn't a devil dies within 30 feet of the infernal war machine, its soul (if it has one) is torn from its body and joins the wailing throng impaled on the spikes. As long as its soul remains trapped, a creature can't be raised from the dead by any means. A trapped soul is freed if the vehicle is destroyed, if the spike anchoring it is the target of a {@spell remove curse} spell or similar magic, or if the spike is destroyed. Each spike is a Small object with AC 19, 15 hit points, and resistance to all damage except radiant damage.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Storm Giant Figurehead
entries: This figurehead depicts a storm giant clutching a thunderbolt. As an action, the ship can activate this item to create a 60-foot cone that originates from the figurehead. Each creature in the cone must make DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails its saving throw is also pushed 10 feet away from the figurehead. Once a ship uses this action, it can't use it again for 1 minute.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Styx Sprayer
entries: This flexible hose is connected to a tank that holds 30 gallons of water from the {@area River Styx|1a3|x}. Each use of the weapon depletes 10 gallons of the water. Refilling the tank requires access to the Styx.

entries.name: Styx Sprayer (Requires 1 Crew and Grants Half Cover; 3 Uses)
entries: {@atk rs}: +5 to hit, range 30 ft., one creature. {@h}The creature is struck by water from the River Styx and targeted by a {@spell feeblemind} spell (save DC 20). An already feebleminded creature is immune to this effect, as is a creature adapted to the River Styx. If the target fails its saving throw and the spell's effect on it is not ended within 30 days, the effect becomes permanent, whereupon the creature loses all its memories and becomes a near-mindless shell of its former self. At that point, nothing short of divine intervention can undo the effect.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Taskmaster's Drums
entries: This 4-foot-tall bronze drum comes with a pair of iron mallets. A creature can activate the drums as an action, causing the hammers to float above the drum and strike it to produce a thundering rhythm. For the next minute, the ship gains one additional action, as long as it has at least one action. Once this item is used, it can't be activated again for {@dice 2d10} hours.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Teleporter
entries: The vehicle's driver can activate this magical device as a bonus action, causing the vehicle to teleport to an unoccupied space that the driver can see up to 300 feet away from the vehicle's current position. All creatures and objects in contact with the vehicle are teleported along with it. This device needs 24 hours to recharge before it can be used again.

vehicleUpgrade.name: Vigilant Watch
entries: A row of crystal orbs, each filled with viscous liquid and a beholder's eyeball, is mounted along this ship's hull. {@condition Invisible} creatures are visible while on the ship or within 120 feet of it.
